attributes.review: When I downloaded this on my grandmas phone she had a heart attack because of the pictures. My little cousin was behind looking at the screen over my shoulder and when she saw it she passed out so that is 2 people on the ground and they had to go to the hospital and they are still in the hospital now even though we download the app 1 MONTH ago. NEVER DOWNLOAD THE APP
attributes.title: NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: upon opening this app i was greeted by a orange 🟠and yucky THING! After a couple minutes in the app Eric trump himself told me to kill myself and i am useless. This really hurt coming from a important figure in my life. I had no other choice than to unstan Donald j. Trump. This is very scary and to thing that other people could be getting the same experience as me hurts. anyway #settleforBiden 💯💯
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: THIS APP NOT ONLY GAVE ME A VIRUS, IT MADE ME THROW UP..... 🤢 this app needs to be removed from the app store, we cannot let anyone’s phone be affected, and we also cannot let anyone else deal with the atrocity that is donald trump’s face when the app opened up...🤮 apple i really do hope you guys take the app down just as a precaution no one else is affected! 😛😛😜😜 #SettleForBiden !!!!
attributes.title: it made my phone glitchy... kinda like a virus

attributes.review: Wasn’t bad at first. Seemed chill. But then all of a sudden a giant Cheeto popped up on my screen and started screaming gibberish at me. I quickly logged out and deleted it. Well later that night, I was in bed and looked out my window and saw a Cheeto in my yard staring up at me! I blinked and it was closer! It wouldn’t stop! And now I’m being followed by a fat Cheeto with an awful wig everywhere I go. Someone make it stop!!!!!!
attributes.title: IM SCARED

attributes.review: Not only is the app plain and ugly, it supports someone who is without a doubt connected to child sex trafficking. That on its own gets a 0/5 stars... And beyond that he supports white power, he is gassing children in cages, and his supporters are molesting/ raping these kids too so, not a fan! Also the app froze for like 30 seconds...
attributes.title: Made it 1 star because it wouldn’t let me rate 0

attributes.review: Hello it’s karen i can’t belive the profanity on this app! I opened it around my child and now he’s crying because the orange man won’t leave his dreams. My best friend fainted at the site of his combover. I am disgusted by the amount of glitches and bugs on this app completely outraged uhg. Also constantly spitting out lies and name calling. This is promoting bullying to my kids! This man should be kicked in his tiny balls!
attributes.title: 0 stars

attributes.review: I consider myself a moderate and thought downloading this app would allow me to see Trump’s political views in a better light than what the media portrays him out to me. Sadly, I was just as disappointed in this news source as I am with CNN. Every single news source was HEAVILY bias and contained twisted stories or lies. Still don’t know who to vote for, but this was a major blow to my perception of the GOP.
attributes.title: Heavily Bias

attributes.review: OK so first of you open the app to see a picture of a soggy Cheeto with his fist in the air? Gross🤢🤮 later after downloading this horrid app I went outside and saw my neighbors had a flag with the soggy Cheeto from the app!! I think that this app might be brainwashing us into believing that butterflies actually exist! How terrifying! Well what I guess I’m trying to say is don’t eat the rusty metal of the road! Ok bye
attributes.title: Absolutely revolting
